data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
After some discussion with Chris Reinardt (maintainer of Net::DNS)
    we descided that to keep Net::DNS portable the DNSSEC exensions,
    which rely on somewhat difficult to port modules, are to be
    distributed seperately.

    Net::DNS contains helper methods and has hooks for Net::DNS::Sec
    since version 0.21.

    DNSSEC is the common name for security extensions to the DNS.
